origin.es: Un pequeño pueblo en Michoacán, México
origin.en: A small town in Michoacán, Mexico

personality.es: Valiente, trabajador, optimista, protector de su familia. Siempre ve el lado positivo incluso en momentos difíciles.
personality.en: Brave, hardworking, optimistic, protective of his family. Always sees the positive side even in difficult times.

backstory.es: Marco cultivaba aguacates en Michoacán hasta que la violencia del narco llegó a su pueblo. Decidió emprender un viaje alrededor del mundo para aprender y encontrar un lugar seguro para su familia. Su sueño es tener una granja donde todos puedan vivir en paz.
backstory.en: Marco grew avocados in Michoacán until cartel violence reached his town. He decided to journey around the world to learn and find a safe place for his family. His dream is to have a farm where everyone can live in peace.

motivations.es: Encontrar un lugar seguro para vivir
motivations.en: Find a safe place to live

motivations.es: Aprender del mundo para ser mejor persona
motivations.en: Learn from the world to become a better person

appearance.outfit: Blue overalls with patches, red cap with 'M', work boots
appearance.accessories: Backpack with country flag pins, black mustache

description.es: Golpe Potente - Marco puede dar un golpe devastador al impactar
description.en: Powerful Punch - Marco can deliver a devastating blow upon impact

voiceStyle.es: Voz cálida y determinada, acento mexicano
voiceStyle.en: Warm and determined voice, Mexican accent

personality.es: Cauteloso pero leal, inteligente, estratega. Aunque tímido, siempre apoya a su hermano en momentos cruciales.
personality.en: Cautious but loyal, intelligent, strategic. Though shy, always supports his brother in crucial moments.

backstory.es: Luis se quedó en México intentando proteger la granja familiar. Cuando las cosas empeoraron, decidió buscar a Marco en Europa. Se reunieron en España y desde entonces viajan juntos.
backstory.en: Luis stayed in Mexico trying to protect the family farm. When things got worse, he decided to find Marco in Europe. They reunited in Spain and have traveled together since.

marco.es: Hermano menor, admiración y lealtad incondicional
marco.en: Younger brother, admiration and unconditional loyalty

appearance.outfit: Blue overalls, green cap with 'L', tool belt

description.es: Salto Alto - Luis puede alcanzar lugares difíciles con su salto potente
description.en: High Jump - Luis can reach difficult places with his powerful jump

voiceStyle.es: Voz suave pero firme, acento mexicano
voiceStyle.en: Soft but firm voice, Mexican accent

personality.es: Fuerte, independiente, empática, apasionada por los idiomas. No necesita ser rescatada, ella rescata a otros.
personality.en: Strong, independent, empathetic, passionate about languages. Doesn't need rescuing, she rescues others.

backstory.es: Patricia trabajaba como intérprete en la Ciudad de México. Al escuchar sobre el viaje de Marco, decidió unirse para documentar las historias de migrantes alrededor del mundo. Se enamoraron durante el viaje y se convirtieron en pareja.
backstory.en: Patricia worked as an interpreter in Mexico City. Hearing about Marco's journey, she decided to join to document migrant stories around the world. They fell in love during the journey and became partners.

marco.es: Pareja romántica, apoyo emocional y estratégico
marco.en: Romantic partner, emotional and strategic support

luis.es: Cuñada, relación de confianza y amistad

appearance.outfit: Practical jeans, travel jacket, small crown headband (subtle)
appearance.accessories: Multilingual phrase book, camera, small tiara as headband
appearance.note: NOT a damsel in distress - she's a hero

description.es: Onda Sónica - Patricia grita con fuerza, derribando estructuras en un área
description.en: Sonic Wave - Patricia shouts forcefully, toppling structures in an area

voiceStyle.es: Voz fuerte y clara, acento mexicano urbano
voiceStyle.en: Strong and clear voice, urban Mexican accent

patricia.inspiredBy: Princess Peach (Nintendo) - but reimagined as strong, independent hero

personality.es: Inocente, curioso, resiliente, lleno de esperanza. Representa a los niños migrantes (Dreamers) que buscan oportunidades.
personality.en: Innocent, curious, resilient, full of hope. Represents migrant children (Dreamers) seeking opportunities.

backstory.es: Teo viajaba con su familia desde Honduras cuando se separaron en un mercado africano. Marco y Patricia lo encontraron solo y decidieron ayudarlo a encontrar a su familia. Mientras tanto, Teo se convirtió en parte de la familia de viajeros.
backstory.en: Teo was traveling with his family from Honduras when they got separated in an African market. Marco and Patricia found him alone and decided to help him find his family. Meanwhile, Teo became part of the travelers' family.

appearance.outfit: Mushroom-spotted cap, small backpack, simple clothes

description.es: Explosión de Esperanza - Teo libera una onda de energía positiva que afecta un área grande
description.en: Hope Burst - Teo releases a wave of positive energy affecting a large area

teo.theme: Represents Dreamers and migrant children seeking better opportunities
teo.inspiredBy: Toad (Nintendo) - but reimagined as migrant child with powerful story

origin.es: Los canales de Xochimilco, Ciudad de México
origin.en: The canals of Xochimilco, Mexico City

personality.es: Sabio, tranquilo, paciente, sanador. Habla en acertijos y enseña lecciones de vida. Representa la sabiduría ancestral mexicana.
personality.en: Wise, calm, patient, healer. Speaks in riddles and teaches life lessons. Represents ancient Mexican wisdom.

backstory.es: Xolo es un ajolote ancestral que ha vivido en los canales de Xochimilco durante siglos. Conoce historias de todos los viajeros que han pasado por México. Se une a la familia en Oceanía para guiarlos en la última parte de su viaje.
backstory.en: Xolo is an ancient axolotl who has lived in the Xochimilco canals for centuries. He knows stories of all travelers who have passed through Mexico. He joins the family in Oceania to guide them in the final part of their journey.

everyone.es: Mentor y guía espiritual de toda la familia
everyone.en: Mentor and spiritual guide to the whole family

appearance.features: Pink with external gills (feathery), bipedal, long tail
appearance.outfit: Small cloth bag with medicinal plants

description.es: Lengua de Agarre - Xolo extiende su lengua para agarrar y jalar bloques o estructuras
description.en: Tongue Grab - Xolo extends his tongue to grab and pull blocks or structures

voiceStyle.es: Voz profunda y pausada, acento mexicano antiguo
voiceStyle.en: Deep and slow voice, ancient Mexican accent

culturalSignificance.es: El ajolote es un símbolo de México, endémico de Xochimilco. Está en peligro de extinción, lo que añade un mensaje de conservación.
culturalSignificance.en: The axolotl is a symbol of Mexico, endemic to Xochimilco. It's endangered, adding a conservation message.

xolo.nahuatlName: Xolotl (Aztec god of lightning and death, who transforms into an axolotl)

personality.es: Autoritario, egocéntrico, proteccionista extremo. Cree que está 'protegiendo' su reino pero en realidad lo está aislando. NO es malvado puro - tiene redención al final.
personality.en: Authoritarian, egocentric, extreme protectionist. Believes he's 'protecting' his kingdom but is actually isolating it. NOT purely evil - has redemption at the end.

backstory.es: Don Bowser construyó un imperio inmobiliario y se convirtió en el guardián del Reino Soñado. Cerró las fronteras creyendo que protegería la riqueza del reino, sin entender que la diversidad lo enriquecería más.
backstory.en: Don Bowser built a real estate empire and became the guardian of the Dream Kingdom. He closed the borders believing he would protect the kingdom's wealth, without understanding that diversity would enrich it more.

appearance.features: Orange turtle with spiky shell, exaggerated blonde combover hair
appearance.outfit: Business suit over shell, long red tie
appearance.accessories: Gold watch, gold rings, small crown

es: Nadie construye muros mejor que yo, créeme
Soy muy inteligente, la tortuga más inteligente
Este es MI reino, y yo decido quién entra
Los viajeros solo traen problemas... ¿o no?
en: Nobody builds walls better than me, believe me
I'm very smart, the smartest turtle
This is MY kingdom, and I decide who enters
Travelers only bring problems... or do they?

beginning.es: Villano que cierra fronteras y construye muros
beginning.en: Villain who closes borders and builds walls

middle.es: Enfrenta a Marco y la familia, intenta detenerlos
middle.en: Confronts Marco and family, tries to stop them

end.es: Aprende que los migrantes enriquecen las sociedades, abre las puertas del reino
end.en: Learns that migrants enrich societies, opens the kingdom's doors

redemption.es: Al final del juego, Marco muestra a Don Bowser los 35 objetos culturales que coleccionó. Don Bowser se da cuenta de que cada cultura tiene algo valioso que aportar. Decide abrir las fronteras y dar la bienvenida a viajeros.
redemption.en: At the end of the game, Marco shows Don Bowser the 35 cultural objects he collected. Don Bowser realizes that each culture has something valuable to contribute. He decides to open the borders and welcome travelers.

bossBattle.structure: Massive golden castle with multiple phases

phase2.es: Derribar torres de vigilancia con Koopas HIELO
phase2.en: Topple watch towers with HIELO Koopas

phase3.es: Confrontación final - Don Bowser se rinde al ver la determinación de la familia
phase3.en: Final confrontation - Don Bowser surrenders seeing the family's determination

themeMessage.es: Representa el sistema anti-migrante y el miedo al 'otro'. Su redención muestra que el cambio es posible con educación y empatía.
themeMessage.en: Represents the anti-migrant system and fear of the 'other'. His redemption shows that change is possible with education and empathy.

don_bowser.note: Satirical character, not a direct representation. Appropriate for ages 12+ with parental guidance.

description.es: Guardias con uniformes y insignias de hielo. Representan al sistema de control migratorio (ICE), no a personas individuales.
description.en: Guards with uniforms and ice insignias. Represent the immigration control system (ICE), not individual people.

behavior.es: Estaticos, no atacan activamente. Son obstáculos que deben ser evitados o desplazados (sin violencia).
behavior.en: Stationary, don't actively attack. They are obstacles that must be avoided or displaced (without violence).

appearance.outfit: Simple guard uniform (no specific agency markings)

whenHit.es: Caen fuera de la pantalla (sin violencia gráfica)

ethicalDesign.es: No se representan como malvados. Son parte del 'sistema', no villanos individuales. No hay violencia contra ellos, solo son desplazados.
ethicalDesign.en: Not represented as evil. They are part of the 'system', not individual villains. No violence against them, just displaced.

themeMessage.es: Representan las barreras sistémicas, no personas. El juego critica el sistema, no a los individuos.
themeMessage.en: Represent systemic barriers, not people. The game criticizes the system, not individuals.

metadata.note: All characters are 100% original. Inspired by Mario Bros aesthetics but with unique designs, names, professions, and stories.
